title: Eternal Sparkle: The Nomi Bridal Ring Set
storytelling_concept: A micro-narrative capturing the timeless elegance and radiant brilliance of the ring, unveiling its luxurious details in a single, shimmering instant.
aesthetic_direction: Ethereal, cinematic style with a refined color palette of warm golds and crisp whites. Soft-focus background with a luminous glow emphasizing the ring's premium quality and intricate design.
lighting_mood: Cinematic lighting with a delicate golden glow, highlighting the diamond's fire and the dual-tone finish. Use of soft reflections to enhance the ring's gleam and texture.
product_focus_strategy: Close-up macro shot focusing on the brilliant round-center diamond and square halo, capturing light interactions, pavé details, and milgrain accents. Subtle rotation to reveal depth and craftsmanship.
narrative_flow: Start with a macro close-up of the center diamond's sparkle, then subtly rotate to showcase the square halo, the split band with shimmering stones, and finish with a soft, shimmering glow around the ring to emphasize luxury.
